attributes.action: insist that the Royal Mail accepts that it has a duty to the UK's electors to deliver postal votes to the Returning Officer at the time of an election, to apologise to the voters of Test Valley for its failure to deliver 957 postal votes at the time of the Borough and Parish elections in May 2007 and to compensate the council tax payers of Test Valley for the costs in excess of £20,000 incurred by their Borough Council in dealing with the consequences of the Royal Mail’s failures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
